basics.name: Pan Yiying
basics.label: Sienor Student @ Zhejiang University
basics.summary: I am a senior student at Zhejiang University, majoring in Psychology. I am interested in the field of information systems and data analysis. I am also interested in the field of psychology and have a deep understanding of human factors.

location.address: Room 211, Ziyun Building 5, Zijingang Campus, Zhejiang University

volunteer.organization: Youth with Rainbow, Growing Together online volunteer teaching
volunteer.summary: Engaged with two students, delivered two lessons per week, tailored the content to meet their needs. Taught high school mathematics courses, selected exemplary problems for tests

awards.title: Honorable Mention in Mathematical Contest In Modeling
2nd Prize in National Mathematics Competition for College Students
3rd Prize in Zhejiang University Mathematical Modeling Competition
2nd Prize in Zhejiang Province Higher Mathematics Competition (Engineering Category)

skills.name: Data Analysis
keywords: Stata (Multiple Regression Model & Cross-section Data Analysis)

interests.name: Food
interests.summary: Delicious food is a significant aspect of my life. I frequently dine at restaurants such as Qingcai, Green Tea, Haidilao, and Meatbenjia. I have explored various chain establishments in Xixi Tianjie and YinTai, with favorites including Goodme grape tea and Chagee’s Spring Peach drink.

interests.name: Literature and Music
interests.summary: My cultural interests include Song Ci poetry, particularly the works of Su Shi, and I enjoy music from artists like Yin Lin and Huang Shifu, alongside a variety of contemporary pop musicians. As a dedicated user of NetEase Cloud Music, I also enjoy karaoke, even if my singing isn’t always on pitch.

interests.name: Travel
interests.summary: I also have a great passion for traveling. So far, I have traveled alone to over 30 cities across the country, experiencing the unique local customs and cultures of different places.

interests.name: Photography
interests.summary: I’ve recently been learning about photography, and I enjoy capturing portraits and beautiful natural landscapes. During the summer of 2024, I participated in a photography course co-organized by Shanghai Jiao Tong University and Canon China, and I had the opportunity to showcase my work in an exhibition. You can also check out my portfolio.

interests.name: Art
interests.summary: I’ve loved art since I was a child. I’m fascinated by the combination of colors, and I learned traditional Chinese painting when I was younger. Now, I’m learning oil painting.
